Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###000-Back
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to go back in the configuration item zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###200-History
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to access the history of a configuration item in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###300-Edit
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to edit a configuration item in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###400-Print
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to print a configuration item in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###500-Link
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu that allows linking a configuration item with another object in the config item zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###550-TreeView
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to display the configuration item links as a Tree View.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###600-Duplicate
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to duplicate a configuration item in the its zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::MenuModule###700-ConfigItemDelete
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to delete a configuration item in its zoom view of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: LinkObject::ComplexTable::SettingsVisibility###ITSMConfigItem
Setting.Description: Define Actions where a settings button is available in the linked objects widget (LinkObject::ViewMode = "complex"). Please note that these Actions must have registered the following JS and CSS files: Core.AllocationList.css, Core.UI.AllocationList.js, Core.UI.Table.Sort.js, Core.Agent.TableFilters.js and Core.Agent.LinkObject.js.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::NumberGenerator
Setting.Description: Selects the configuration item number generator module. "AutoIncrement" increments the configuration item number, the SystemID, the ConfigItemClassID and the counter are used. The format is "SystemID.ConfigItemClassID.Counter", e.g. 1205000004, 1205000005.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::CINameRegex
Setting.Description: Defines regular expressions individually for each ConfigItem class to check the ConfigItem name and to show corresponding error messages.

Hash.Item: A computer name must start with ABC!
A hardware name must end with two digits!

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::VersionTrigger
Setting.Description: Define which attribute changes will trigger the creation of a new version per class. For every class as key, valid values are the standard attributes: DeploymentState, IncidentState and Name. Additionally all dynamic fields can be triggers, the values here are then "DynamicField_Name".

Setting.Name: LinkObject::DefaultSubObject###ITSMConfigItem
Setting.Description: Defines the default subobject of the class 'ITSMConfigItem'.

Setting.Name: LinkObject::ITSMConfigItem::ShowColumns
Setting.Description: Defines the shown columns of CIs in the link table complex view for all CI classes. If there is no entry, then the default columns are shown.

Setting.Name: LinkObject::ITSMConfigItem::ShowColumnsByClass
Setting.Description: Defines the shown columns of CIs in the link table complex view, depending on the CI class. Each entry must be prefixed with the class name and double colons (i.e. Computer::). There are a few CI-Attributes that common to all CIs (example for the class Computer: Computer::Name, Computer::CurDeplState, Computer::CreateTime). To show individual CI-Attributes as defined in the CI-Definition, the following scheme must be used (example for the class Computer): Computer::HardDisk::1, Computer::HardDisk::1::Capacity::1, Computer::HardDisk::2, Computer::HardDisk::2::Capacity::1. If there is no entry for a CI class, then the default columns are shown.

Setting.Name: Stats::DynamicObjectRegistration###ITSMConfigItem
Setting.Description: Module to generate ITSM config item statistics.

Setting.Name: ImportExport::ObjectBackendRegistration###ITSMConfigItem
Setting.Description: Object backend module registration for the import/export module.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::EventModulePost###100-History
Setting.Description: Config item event module that enables logging to history in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::EventModulePost###300-DefinitionConfigItemUpdate
Setting.Description: Config item event module that updates config items to their current definition.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::EventModulePost###400-LinkSync
Setting.Description: Config item event module that updates the table configitem_ĺink.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::HistoryOrder
Setting.Description: Shows the config item history (reverse ordered) in the agent interface.

Setting.Description: Module to check the group responsible for a class.

Setting.Description: Module to check the group responsible for a configuration item.

Setting.Description: Defines the number of rows for the CI definition editor in the admin interface.

Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the edit ITSM configuration item screen in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemEdit###DynamicField
Setting.Description: Dynamic fields shown in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemAdd###Permission
Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the add ITSM configuration item screen in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemHistory###Permission
Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the history ITSM configuration item screen in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemPrint###Permission
Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the print ITSM configuration item screen in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemPrint###DynamicField
Setting.Description: Dynamic fields shown in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemDelete###Permission
Setting.Description: Required privileges to delete config items.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemZoom###Permission
Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the ITSM configuration item zoom screen in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemZoom###DynamicField
Setting.Description: Dynamic fields shown in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###Permission
Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the ITSM configuration item search screen in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###ExtendedSearchCondition
Setting.Description: Allows extended search conditions in config item search of the agent interface. With this feature you can search e. g. config item name with this kind of conditions like "(*key1*&&*key2*)" or "(*key1*||*key2*)".

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###SearchPageShown
Setting.Description: Number of config items to be displayed in each page of a search result in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###SortBy::Default
Setting.Description: Defines the default config item attribute for config item sorting of the config item search result of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###Order::Default
Setting.Description: Defines the default config item order in the config item search result of the agent interface. Up: oldest on top. Down: latest on top.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###SearchCSVData
Setting.Description: Data used to export the search result in CSV format.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###SearchCSVDynamicField
Setting.Description: Dynamic Fields used to export the search result in CSV format.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###Defaults###Number
Setting.Description: Defines the default shown config item search attribute for config item search screen.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###Defaults###Name
Setting.Description: Defines the default shown config item search attribute for config item search screen.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###Defaults###DeploymentStateIDs
Setting.Description: Defines the default shown config item search attribute for config item search screen.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###Defaults###IncidentStateIDs
Setting.Description: Defines the default shown config item search attribute for config item search screen.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###Defaults###CustomerID
Setting.Description: Defines the default shown config item search attribute for config item search screen.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###Defaults###CustomerUserLogin
Setting.Description: Defines the default shown config item search attribute for config item search screen.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###Defaults###ITSMConfigItemCreateTimePoint
Setting.Description: Default data to use on attribute for config item search screen. Example: "ITSMConfigItemCreateTimePointFormat=year;ITSMConfigItemCreateTimePointStart=Last;ITSMConfigItemCreateTimePoint=2;".

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###Defaults###ITSMConfigItemCreateTimeSlot
Setting.Description: Default data to use on attribute for config item search screen. Example: "ITSMConfigItemCreateTimeStartYear=2010;ITSMConfigItemCreateTimeStartMonth=10;ITSMConfigItemCreateTimeStartDay=4;ITSMConfigItemCreateTimeStopYear=2010;ITSMConfigItemCreateTimeStopMonth=11;ITSMConfigItemCreateTimeStopDay=3;".

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###Defaults###ITSMConfigItemChangeTimePoint
Setting.Description: Defines the default shown config item search attribute for config item search screen.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###Defaults###ITSMConfigItemChangeTimeSlot
Setting.Description: Defines the default shown config item search attribute for config item search screen.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###Defaults###SearchPreviousVersions
Setting.Description: Defines the default shown config item search attribute for config item search screen.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###Defaults###DynamicField
Setting.Description: Defines the default shown config item search attribute for config item search screen. Example: "Key" must have the name of the Dynamic Field in this case 'X', "Content" must have the value of the Dynamic Field depending on the Dynamic Field type, Text: 'a text', Dropdown: '1', Date/Time: 'Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStartYear=1974; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStartMonth=01; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStartDay=26; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStartHour=00; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStartMinute=00; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStartSecond=00; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStopYear=2013; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStopMonth=01; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStopDay=26; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStopHour=23; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStopMinute=59; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStopSecond=59;' and or 'Search_DynamicField_XTimePointFormat=week; Search_DynamicField_XTimePointStart=Before; Search_DynamicField_XTimePointValue=7';.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItemSearch###Permission
Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the ITSM configuration item search screen in the customer interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItemSearch###DeploymentState
Setting.Description: Includes deployment states in the config item search of the customer interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItemSearch###IncidentState
Setting.Description: Includes incident states in the config item search of the customer interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItemSearch###ExtendedSearchCondition
Setting.Description: Allows extended search conditions in config item search of the customer interface. With this feature you can search e. g. config item name with this kind of conditions like "(*key1*&&*key2*)" or "(*key1*||*key2*)".

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItemSearch###SearchPageShown
Setting.Description: Number of config items to be displayed in each page of a search result in the customer interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItemSearch###SortBy::Default
Setting.Description: Defines the default config item attribute for config item sorting of the config item search result of the customer interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItemSearch###Order::Default
Setting.Description: Defines the default config item order in the config item search result of the customer interface. Up: oldest on top. Down: latest on top.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItemSearch###Defaults###Number
Setting.Description: Defines the default shown config item search attribute for config item search screen.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItemSearch###Defaults###Name
Setting.Description: Defines the default shown config item search attribute for config item search screen.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItemSearch###Defaults###DeploymentStateIDs
Setting.Description: Defines the default shown config item search attribute for config item search screen.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItemSearch###Defaults###IncidentStateIDs
Setting.Description: Defines the default shown config item search attribute for config item search screen.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItemSearch###Defaults###DynamicField
Setting.Description: Defines the default shown config item search attribute for config item search screen. Example: "Key" must have the name of the Dynamic Field in this case 'X', "Content" must have the value of the Dynamic Field depending on the Dynamic Field type, Text: 'a text', Dropdown: '1', Date/Time: 'Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStartYear=1974; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStartMonth=01; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStartDay=26; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStartHour=00; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStartMinute=00; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStartSecond=00; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStopYear=2013; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStopMonth=01; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStopDay=26; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStopHour=23; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStopMinute=59; Search_DynamicField_XTimeSlotStopSecond=59;' and or 'Search_DynamicField_XTimePointFormat=week; Search_DynamicField_XTimePointStart=Before; Search_DynamicField_XTimePointValue=7';.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemTreeView###Permission
Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the ITSM configuration item tree view screen in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: GeneralCatalogPreferences###Permissions
Setting.Description: Parameters for the example permission groups of the general catalog attributes.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Search###ConfigItem
Setting.Description: Configuration item search backend router of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Search::JavaScript###ConfigItem
Setting.Description: JavaScript function for the search frontend.

Setting.Name: Loader::Agent::CommonJS###100-ConfigurationManagement
Setting.Description: List of JS files to always be loaded for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: PreferencesGroups###ConfigItemOverviewSmallPageShown
Setting.Description: Parameters for the pages (in which the configuration items are shown).

Setting.Name: PreferencesGroups###ConfigItemOverviewFilterSettings
Setting.Description: Parameters for the column filters of the small config item overview. Please note: setting 'Active' to 0 will only prevent agents from editing settings of this group in their personal preferences, but will still allow administrators to edit the settings of another user's behalf. Use 'PreferenceGroup' to control in which area these settings should be shown in the user interface.

Hash.Item: Column config item filters for ConfigItem Overview.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::Overview###Small
Setting.Description: Defines an overview module to show the small view of a configuration item list.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItem###DefaultColumns
Setting.Description: Columns that can be filtered in the config item overview of the agent interface. Note: Only Config Item attributes and Dynamic Fields (DynamicField_NameX) are allowed.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItem###DefaultColumns
Setting.Description: Columns that can be filtered in the config item overview of the customer interface. Note: Only Config Item attributes and Dynamic Fields (DynamicField_NameX) are allowed.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Hook
Setting.Description: The identifier for a configuration item, e.g. ConfigItem#, MyConfigItem#. The default is ConfigItem#.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###SearchLimit
Setting.Description: Defines the search limit for the AgentITSMConfigItemSearch screen.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItem###SearchLimit
Setting.Description: Defines the search limit for the AgentITSMConfigItem screen.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItem###ClassColumnsAvailable
Setting.Description: Defines the available columns of CIs in the config item overview depending on the CI class. Each entry must consist of a class name and an array of available fields for the corresponding class. Dynamic field entries have to honor the scheme DynamicField_FieldName.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItem###ClassColumnsDefault
Setting.Description: Defines the default displayed columns of CIs in the config item overview depending on the CI class. Each entry must consist of a class name and an array of available fields for the corresponding class. Dynamic field entries have to honor the scheme DynamicField_FieldName.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemSearch###DynamicField
Setting.Description: Dynamic fields shown in the config item search screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItem###DynamicField
Setting.Description: Dynamic fields shown in the config item overview screen of the customer interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItemSearch###DynamicField
Setting.Description: Dynamic fields shown in the config item overview screen of the customer interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItemSearch###SearchLimit
Setting.Description: Defines the search limit for the CustomerITSMConfigItemSearch screen.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItem###SearchLimit
Setting.Description: Defines the search limit for the CustomerITSMConfigItem screen.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItem###ClassColumnsAvailable
Setting.Description: Defines the available columns of CIs in the config item overview depending on the CI class. Each entry must consist of a class name and an array of available fields for the corresponding class. Dynamic field entries have to honor the scheme DynamicField_FieldName.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItem###ClassColumnsDefault
Setting.Description: Defines the default displayed columns of CIs in the config item overview depending on the CI class. Each entry must consist of a class name and an array of available fields for the corresponding class. Dynamic field entries have to honor the scheme DynamicField_FieldName.

Setting.Name: UniqueCIName::EnableUniquenessCheck
Setting.Description: Enables/disables the functionality to check ITSM onfiguration items for unique names. Before enabling this option you should check your system for already existing config items with duplicate names. You can do this with the console command Admin::ITSM::Configitem::ListDuplicates.

Setting.Name: UniqueCIName::UniquenessCheckScope
Setting.Description: Check for a unique name only within the same ConfigItem class ('class') or globally ('global'), which means every existing ConfigItem is taken into account when looking for duplicates.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::BulkFeature
Setting.Description: Enables configuration item bulk action feature for the agent frontend to work on more than one configuration item at a time.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::BulkFeatureGroup
Setting.Description: Enables configuration item bulk action feature only for the listed groups.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentITSMConfigItemBulk
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Navigation###AgentITSMConfigItemBulk###003-ITSMConfigItem
Setting.Description: Main menu item registration.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemBulk###Permission
Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the bulk ITSM configuration item screen in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemBulk###DynamicField
Setting.Description: Dynamic fields shown in the additional ITSM field screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentITSMConfigItemAttachment
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemAttachment###Permission
Setting.Description: Required permissions to use the ITSM configuration item attachment action in the agent interface.

Setting.Name: CustomerFrontend::Module###CustomerITSMConfigItemAttachment
Setting.Description: Frontend module registration for the customer interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::PreMenuModule###100-Zoom
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to zoom into a configuration item in the configuration item overview of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::PreMenuModule###200-History
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to access the history of a configuration item in the configuration item overview of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::PreMenuModule###300-Duplicate
Setting.Description: Shows a link in the menu to duplicate a configuration item in the configuration item overview of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemBulk###DeplState
Setting.Description: Sets the deployment state in the configuration item bulk screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::AgentITSMConfigItemBulk###InciState
Setting.Description: Sets the incident state in the configuration item bulk screen of the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Frontend::AdminModuleGroups###200-ITSMConfigurationManagement
Setting.Description: Defines available groups for the admin overview screen.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItemZoom###VersionsEnabled
Setting.Description: Customers can see historic CI versions.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItemZoom###VersionsSelectable
Setting.Description: Customers have the possibility to manually switch between historic CI versions.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::Frontend::CustomerITSMConfigItemZoom###GeneralInfo
Setting.Description: Which general information is shown in the header.

Setting.Name: AgentCustomerInformationCenter::Backend###0060-CIC-ITSMConfigItemCustomerCompany
Setting.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the customer company config item overview of the agent interface . "Limit" is the number of entries shown by default. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

Setting.Name: AgentCustomerUserInformationCenter::Backend###0060-CUIC-ITSMConfigItemCustomerUser
Setting.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the customer company config item overview of the agent interface . "Limit" is the number of entries shown by default. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

Setting.Name: Elasticsearch::ExcludedCIClasses
Setting.Description: ConfigItems of the following classes will not be stored on the Elasticsearch server. To apply this to existing CIs, the CI migration has to be run via console, after changing this option.

Setting.Name: Elasticsearch::ExcludedCIDeploymentStates
Setting.Description: ConfigItems with the following deployment states will not be stored on the Elasticsearch server. To apply this to existing CIs, the CI migration has to be run via console, after changing this option.

Setting.Name: Elasticsearch::ConfigItemStoreFields
Setting.Description: Fields stored in the configuration item index which are used for other things besides fulltext searches. For the complete functionality all fields are mandatory.

Setting.Name: Elasticsearch::ConfigItemSearchFields
Setting.Description: Fields of the configuration item index, used for the fulltext search. Fields are also stored, but are not mandatory for the overall functionality. Inclusion of attachments can be disabled by setting the entry to 0 or deleting it.

Setting.Name: Elasticsearch::QuickSearchShow###ConfigItem
Setting.Description: Objects to search for, how many entries and which attributs to show. ConfigItem attributes have to explicitly be stored via Elasticsearch.

Setting.Name: Events###ITSMConfigItem
Setting.Description: List of all Package events to be displayed in the GUI.

Setting.Name: DynamicFields::ObjectType###ITSMConfigItem
Setting.Description: DynamicField object registration.

Setting.Name: DynamicFieldScreens###ITSMConfigurationManagement
Setting.Description: This configuration defines all possible screens to enable or disable dynamic fields.

Setting.Name: DefaultColumnsScreens###ITSMConfigurationManagement
Setting.Description: This configuration defines all possible screens to enable or disable default columns.

Setting.Name: DynamicFields::Driver###ConfigItem
Setting.Description: DynamicField backend registration.

Setting.Name: DynamicFields::Driver###ConfigItemVersion
Setting.Description: DynamicField backend registration.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::NameModule
Setting.Description: This configuration defines modules to suggest and check names for config items per config item class.

Setting.Name: ITSMConfigItem::VersionStringModule
Setting.Description: This configuration defines modules to suggest and check version strings for config items per config item class.

Setting.Name: DynamicField::EventModulePost###200-DynamicFieldSync
Setting.Description: Dynamic field event module that marks config item definitions as out of sync, if containing dynamic fields change.

Setting.Name: Customer::ConfigItem::PermissionConditions###01
Setting.Description: Define a set of conditions under which a customer is allowed to see a config item. Conditions can optionally be restricted to certain customer groups. Name is the only mandatory attribute. If no other options are given, all config items will be visible under that category.

Setting.Name: Customer::ConfigItem::PermissionConditions###02
Setting.Description: Define a set of conditions under which a customer is allowed to see a config item. Conditions can optionally be restricted to certain customer groups. Name is the only mandatory attribute. If no other options are given, all config items will be visible under that category.

Setting.Description: Define a set of conditions under which a customer is allowed to see a config item. Conditions can optionally be restricted to certain customer groups. Name is the only mandatory attribute. If no other options are given, all config items will be visible under that category.

Setting.Name: Customer::ConfigItem::PermissionConditions###04
Setting.Description: Define a set of conditions under which a customer is allowed to see a config item. Conditions can optionally be restricted to certain customer groups. Name is the only mandatory attribute. If no other options are given, all config items will be visible under that category.

Setting.Description: Define a set of conditions under which a customer is allowed to see a config item. Conditions can optionally be restricted to certain customer groups. Name is the only mandatory attribute. If no other options are given, all config items will be visible under that category.

Setting.Name: CMDBTreeView::DefaultDepth
Setting.Description: Defines the default relations depth to be shown.

Setting.Name: CMDBTreeView::ShowLinkLabels
Setting.Description: Defines if the link type labels must be shown in the node connections.
